subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration
body:
We keep receiving emails saying integration has been disabled. If they are in fact not true, can we disable the email notifications? Looks like they�re being sent to all agency admins.

 

 

Thanks,

 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

 



 

From: Flock Safety Support <support@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, May 13, 2025 16:35
To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov>
Cc: emily.atzen@flocksafety.com; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

This is likely erroneous and can be ignored if the integration is currently working for you and your users. Please let me know if that is not the case.

 

-Rhianna

 

 

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: SHANNON Travis S [tshannon@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 5/13/2025, 11:52 AM
To: support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com 
Cc: emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com ; ddewitt@eugene-or.gov ddewitt@eugene-or.gov 
Subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

Good afternoon,

 

This morning I was able to create the API in evidence.com and add it into the Flock dashboard.

 

I tested a plate search and successfully imported it to evidence.com. The image and all meta data came over as expected.

 

I just received an email a few minutes ago that said the integration has been disabled because of too many failures.

 

Can you please provide some insight on what the failures are? I configured the API permissions as outlined in the help article.

 

Thank you!

 



 

 



 

 



 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

 



 

From: Flock Safety Support <support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com > 
Sent: Thursday, May 8, 2025 15:43
To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov >
Cc: emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com ; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Happy to help! Let us know if you have any further concerns. 

 

 

-Rhianna

 

 

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: SHANNON Travis S [tshannon@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 5/8/2025, 1:41 PM
To: support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com 
Cc: emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com ; ddewitt@eugene-or.gov ddewitt@eugene-or.gov 
Subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

Looks like that article has the information we needed. Thank you for providing it.

 

 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

 



 

From: Flock Safety Support <support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com > 
Sent: Thursday, May 8, 2025 13:39
To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov >
Cc: emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com ; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank you for the clarification! I am not sure where the communication gap is, but the documentation for this integration is in our Help Center, which you can access through the ? in the top right of your Flock screen. I am sorry that this was not provided when requested initially, but happy to help out here.

 

Here is the link to the Axon integration specific article: 

Connect Axon and Flock Safety https://help.flocksafety.com/s/article/How-to-Connect-Axon-to-Flock-Safety 

 

Hope this helps! 

 

-Rhianna

 

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: SHANNON Travis S [tshannon@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 5/8/2025, 12:23 PM
To: support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com 
Cc: emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com ; ddewitt@eugene-or.gov ddewitt@eugene-or.gov 
Subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

Rhianna,

 

The only permissions enabled for the Axon/Flock API is the one called �evidence.any.create�.

 

After multiple requests, we have not received any instruction or guidance from Flock on what permissions need to be enabled.

 

*****Flock needs to provide us a list of API permissions that need to be enabled for this to work.*****

 

 

Please reach out if you need further clarification.

 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

 



 

From: Flock Safety Support <support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com > 
Sent: Thursday, April 17, 2025 17:10
To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov >
Cc: emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com ; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

 

	You don't often get email from support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  

	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank you! This is not what I asked for.

 

Can you please provide me with a screenshot of what API permissions you enabled for your Axon API integration that was intended to be connected to Flock? To see the permissions in the established API, you can hover over the permissions part of the API listing in your Axon interface. 

 

-Rhianna

 

 

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: SHANNON Travis S [tshannon@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 4/17/2025, 4:22 PM
To: support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com ; ddewitt@eugene-or.gov ddewitt@eugene-or.gov 
Cc: emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com 
Subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

Here are all the options under Evidence. We can select the option of Allowed  or Prohibited for each item on the list.

 

any.create

agency.view.forensic

any.editcontentwarning

share

any.read

any.audit

self.editautotranscript

hierarchy.user.access

agency.modify.group

any.restrict

sharewith

any.cewLog

self.restrict

sharewithdownload

self.orderautotranscript

hierarchy.group.access

self.editcontentwarning

any.orderautotranscript

 

 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

Hi there,

Happy to take a look! I see an image mentioned, but I don't see it in this thread. Can you please send me a screenshot of the permissions that you included in your API and the error screen in Flock? 

 

To see the permissions in the API, you can hover over the permissions part of the API listing in your Axon interface. 

 

I look forward to assisting you further. 

 

Stay safe,

Rhianna

Hello, 

 

I so apologize for missing you message on Tuesday and thank you for following up! I am looping in @Flock Safety Support support@flocksafety.com  here to take a further look. 

 

@Flock Safety Support support@flocksafety.com - OR Eugene is receiving the attached error message when trying to complete their Axon integration. Is this a known issue? Please advise! 

 

Thank you, 

Emily

thread_messages.body:
We keep receiving emails saying integration has been disabled. If they are in fact not true, can we disable the email notifications? Looks like they�re being sent to all agency admins.

 

 

Thanks,

 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

[EXTERNAL ?]

This is likely erroneous and can be ignored if the integration is currently working for you and your users. Please let me know if that is not the case.

 

-Rhianna

 

 

--------------- Original Message ---------------

thread_messages.subject: RE: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration
thread_messages.body:
Good afternoon,

 

This morning I was able to create the API in evidence.com and add it into the Flock dashboard.

 

I tested a plate search and successfully imported it to evidence.com. The image and all meta data came over as expected.

 

I just received an email a few minutes ago that said the integration has been disabled because of too many failures.

 

Can you please provide some insight on what the failures are? I configured the API permissions as outlined in the help article.

 

Thank you!

 



 

 



 

 



 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

Yes, these are API settings that I can create.
